text: Citigroup Inc. or Citi (stylized as citi) is the world's largest financial services company headquartered in New York and the first American company that was able to combine insurance and banking after the Great Depression of 1929. Citigroup operates with two major divisions: Institutional Clients Group (ICG), which offers investment banking and corporate banking services, as well as treasury and trade solutions (TTS) and securities services such as custodian banking; and Personal Banking and Wealth Management (PBWM), which includes Citibank, a retail bank, the third largest issuer of credit cards, as well as its wealth management business. ==References== Category:Banks based in New York City
title: Citigroup
